notes: Very clean and modern apartment with recessed lighting, built-in wood cabinetry, large flat-screen TV, split AC units in multiple rooms, modern kitchen with stainless steel refrigerator and washing machine, and a separate bedroom with wood flooring. For baby safety, floors are smooth tile/wood (easy to clean), no visible sharp corners on furniture, and no balcony visible which is good. The intercom system suggests a secure building with elevator (11-story building at 6F).
